name: Lemon Alien Dawg
description: Lemon Alien Dawg comes from Alien Genetics, who crossbred an Alien Dawg female with Lemon Kush to create this pungent hybrid cannabis strain. Large chunky buds radiate with sweet and sour fruity notes dominated by the zesty scent of lemon. Leaning slightly to the indica side of the genetic spectrum, Lemon Alien Dawg lets your body sink into deep relaxation while the mind floats away to happy escapes.
attributes_title: Happy, Energetic, Relaxed, Uplifted, Euphoric, Depression, Stress, Nausea, Fatigue, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Headache, Anxious, Dry Eyes
